commands.name: ping
commands.help: I'll reply to you with pong!

commands.name: say
commands.help: Repeat after me.

commands.name: purge
commands.help: Use this command to delete any amount of message up to 100.

commands.name: eval
commands.help: Allows for the execution of arbitrary Javascript.

commands.name: plaineval
commands.help: Allows for the execution of arbitrary Javascript.

commands.name: globalban
commands.help: Deny a user from using the bot globally.

commands.name: twitch
commands.help: Tells you if a specified streamer is live on Twitch.tv

commands.name: customize
commands.help: Adjust my behaviour in this server!

commands.name: info
commands.help: I'll print some information about me.

commands.name: leave-server
commands.help: I'll leave this server if I am not welcome here.

commands.name: killswitch
commands.help: This will instantly terminate all running bot processes

commands.name: namechanges
commands.help: I will tell you the name changes for the user you mention.

commands.name: setlevel
commands.help: This changes the permission level of a user.

commands.name: addrole
commands.help: Give a role to user or users.

commands.name: takerole
commands.help: Take a role from a user or users

commands.name: rankup
commands.help: Level up somebody's level by one.

commands.name: setnsfw
commands.help: This changes if the channel allows NSFW commands.

commands.name: hello
commands.help: I'll respond to you with hello along with a GitHub link!

commands.name: setstatus
commands.help: Change my playing status on Discord to something else or pass nothing to clear the status!
commands.usage: !setstatus <online / idle / dnd / invisible / twitch url> [playing status]

commands.name: server-info
commands.help: I'll tell you some information about the server you're currently in.

commands.name: userinfo
commands.help: I'll get some information about the user you've mentioned.

commands.name: join-server
commands.help: I'll join the server you've requested me to join, as long as the invite is valid and I'm not banned of already in the requested server.

commands.name: kick
commands.help: Kick the user(s) out of the server!

commands.name: ban
commands.help: Swing the banhammer on someone!

commands.name: hackban
commands.help: Swing the ban hammer on someone who isn't a member of the server!

commands.name: softban
commands.help: Bans and immediately unbans the user, removing their messages.

commands.name: prefix
commands.help: If you, despite reading this have no clue what my prefix is, I'll tell you!

commands.name: colorrole
commands.help: Use this to color a role you have!

commands.name: gif
commands.help: I'll search Giphy for a gif matching your tags.

commands.name: rip
commands.help: Posts a ripme.xyz link

commands.name: fortunecow
commands.help: I'll get a random fortunecow!

commands.name: randomcat
commands.help: I'll get a random cat image for you!

commands.name: randomdog
commands.help: I'll get a random doggo image for you!

commands.name: dogfact
commands.help: I'll give you some interesting dogfacts!

commands.name: catfact
commands.help: I'll give you some interesting catfacts!

commands.name: leetspeak
commands.help: 1'Ll 3nc0d3 Y0uR Me5s@g3 1Nt0 l337sp3@K!

commands.name: stroke
commands.help: I'll stroke someones ego!

commands.name: yomomma
commands.help: I'll get a random yomomma joke for you!

commands.name: advice
commands.help: I'll give you some fantastic advice!

commands.name: yesno
commands.help: Returns a gif displaying yes or no

commands.name: urbandictionary
commands.help: I'll fetch what idiots on the internet think something means

commands.name: fact
commands.help: I'll give you some interesting facts!

commands.name: dice
commands.help: I'll roll some dice!

commands.name: fancyinsult
commands.help: I'll insult your friends!

commands.name: cleverbot
commands.help: Talk to cleverbot!

commands.name: e621
commands.help: e621, the definition of *Stop taking the Internet so seriously.*
commands.usage: !e621 <tags> multiword tags need to be typed like: eaglebot_is_a_discord_bot

commands.name: rule34
commands.help: Rule#34 : If it exists there is porn of it. If not, start uploading.

commands.name: meme
commands.help: I'll create a meme with your suffixes!

commands.name: xkcd
commands.help: I'll get a XKCD comic for you, you can define a comic number and I'll fetch that one.
commands.usage: !xkcd Nothing for a random comic, current for latest, number to get that comic.

commands.name: magic8ball
commands.help: I'll make a prediction using a Magic 8 Ball

commands.name: randommeme
commands.help: I'll get a random meme for you!

commands.name: shorten
commands.help: Shorten an url using goo.gl.

commands.name: music
commands.help: I'll pause or play the music, just tell me what after the command!

commands.name: volume
commands.help: I'll change my volume or return the current volume if you don't provide a number!

commands.name: voteskip
commands.help: Vote to skip the current playing song.

commands.name: shuffle
commands.help: Shuffle the current playlist.

commands.name: leave-voice
commands.help: I'll leave the current voice channel.

commands.name: skip
commands.help: I'll skip this song if you don't like it.

commands.name: playlist
commands.help: Use delete and a song number to remove it from the list else I will fetch you the playlist I'm currently playing!

commands.name: voice
commands.help: I'll join a voice channel!

commands.name: request
commands.help: Use this to request songs!

commands.name: tag
commands.help: Tags!

commands.name: customize nsfw
commands.help: Changes my reply when someones uses a NSFW command while I disallow that.

commands.name: customize permissions
commands.help: Changes my reply when someone tries to use a command they do not have access to

commands.name: customize welcome
commands.help: Changes my welcoming message.

commands.name: customize welcoming
commands.help: Changes wether I should welcome new people.

commands.name: customize timeout
commands.help: Changes my reply when someones uses a command that is still in cooldown

commands.name: customize prefix
commands.help: Changes the prefix I listen to on this server, mentions will still count as a global prefix

commands.name: customize volume
commands.help: Changes the default volume the bot will assume when joining a voice channel.

commands.name: customize replay
commands.help: Changes wether I replay the playlist or not
